entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:49 p.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain mixed with drizzle this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain or snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
